targets.expr: ((1 - sum without (mode) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter", mode=~"idle|iowait|steal", instance="$instance"}[30s])))/ ignoring(cpu) group_left  count without (cpu, mode) (node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter", mode="idle", instance="$instance"}))*100

sum by (namespace)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", cluster_name="$cluster"}) /
sum by (namespace)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", cluster_name="$cluster"})

sum by (namespace)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", cluster_name="$cluster"}) /
sum by (namespace)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", cluster_name="$cluster"})

sum by (node)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", cluster_name="$cluster"}) /
sum by (node)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", cluster_name="$cluster"})

sum by (node)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", cluster_name="$cluster"}) /
sum by (node)(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", cluster_name="$cluster"})
